medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was awoken from sleep at 4am with acute RUQ abdominal pain that is 'boring' in quality, approximately ___ in severity, and is constant/unremitting. The same type of pain was experienced approximately 18 months ago when diagnosed with biliary colic, having elevated WBC count at that time. The pain resolved but reoccurred after a low-fat diet and a recent meal that included mayonnaise and a small steak. Recent work-related stress and night-time palpitations were also noted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Palpitations; past episode of biliary colic 18 months ago.
